text: Bob Lanier (March 10, 1925 â€“ December 20, 2014) was an American businessman and politician. He served as mayor of the city of Houston, Texas from 1992 to 1998. Lanier was born in Baytown, Texas. On December 20, 2014, Lanier died at the age of 89 in Houston, Texas from natural causes. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lanier, Robert "Bob" and Jim Barlow. Mayor Bob Lanier Oral History , Houston Oral History Project, January 8, 2008. title: Bob Lanier (politician)
